context: I bullied another student in your class
letters:
Dear [Teacher's Name],

I am writing to sincerely apologize for my behavior towards [Student's Name] in your class. I deeply regret my actions and acknowledge that I bullied them, which was entirely unacceptable.

I understand the negative impact that my behavior has had on [Student's Name], and I cannot express enough how sorry I am for the pain and discomfort I have caused. I recognize that every student deserves to feel safe and respected in the classroom, and I failed to uphold that principle.

I am committed to reflecting on my actions and learning from this experience. I intend to take steps to ensure that such behavior does not occur again in the future. I would appreciate any guidance you could provide regarding how I can better support a positive and inclusive environment for everyone.

Thank you for your understanding, and I hope to make amends for my actions.

Sincerely,  
[Your Name]
